EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell GoDirect Connected Maintenance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Honeywell GoDirect Connected Maintenance.
Here are the resources you requested:
- Honeywell's Connected Aircraft Maintenance Reduces Delays and Cancellations for Cathay Pacific. Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/june/honeywell-s-connected-aircraft-maintenance-reduces-delays-and-cancellations-for-cathay-pacific]]>
- Hainan Airlines First to Adopt Honeywell's Groundbreaking GoDirect Connected Maintenance for Auxiliary Power Units. Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/may/hainan-airlines-first-to-adopt-honeywell-s-groundbreaking-godirect-connected-maintenance-for-apus]]>
- Brochure <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/aerospace/files/brochures/a60-1573-000-000_connectedapus_bro.pdf]]> - GoDirect Connected Maintenance for Auxiliary Power Units
Please contact aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> for additional information.
Warm regards, Honeywell Aerospace
